topic: Teaching a child to ride a bike
system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: Teaching a child to ride a bike
generated_text:
Hold child on bike seat. Explain balance, steering. 
Push bike forward, let child pedal. 
Gradually release grip on seat. 
Offer support, guide child. 
Encourage balance, confidence. 
Remove training wheels. 
Practice, practice, practice.
